column1: Uchi////so what would i order if i had to do it all over again?  of the three different pieces of nigiri i ordered
column2: my recommendation is to just order the mackerel 3 times.  it starts UNDERWHELMING but develops into a complex and delightful finish.  the others finished as they started
column3: flabby and bland.  at $7 for each piece
column4: pick wisely.  at nearly $25 per entree
column6: pick wisely.  my recommendation is to order the wildflower alaskan crab
column7: which was actually very very tasty.  ive never had crab prepared that way before
column8: it had a sweetness to it.  and then order the beef.  after all of that
column9: you might feel like you've had a light entree.
